doc.title: The Commendation Meeting for 2017 Military Training and Farewell Meeting for New Recruits of Nankai University
doc.snippet: The Commendation Meeting for 2017 Military Training and Farewell Meeting for New Recruits of Nankai University were held in the auditorium of the main building at Balitai Campus. A total of 85 training officers, more than 400 representatives of teachers and students and 8 students attended the event.
